mapper.insert: insert into support(userid, vnumber, vgroup, vtime, carrer, vreason) value(#{userid}, #{vnumber}, #{vgroup}, #{vtime}, #{carrer}, #{vreason})
insert into support(userid, dgroup, vtime, dmoney, dmode) value(#{userid} ,#{dgroup}, #{vtime}, #{dmoney}, #{dmode})
mapper.select: select s.userid, vgroup, dgroup, vtime, dmoney, dmode,tel from support as s join user as u on s.userid = u.userid;
